title: The default value set in list box of report parameter is lost after modifying the default value
description: When modifying the default value of a list box in a report parameter, the original value is lost. Steps to reproduce: 1. Create a report parameter and set the Display type to List Box. 2. Enter three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', and set 'aa' as the default value. Click OK. 3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, update 'aa' to 'aaa' and click OK without modifying anything else. 4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog.
OB: The default value of the list box in the report parameter is lost after modifying it.
EB: The default value of the list box in the report parameter should remain unchanged after modifying it.
SR: 1. Create a report parameter with the Display type set to List Box. Enter three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc' and set 'aa' as the default. Click OK. 2. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog, update 'aa' to 'aaa' and click OK without modifying anything else. 3. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog to verify that the default value is still 'aaa'.
